title: Virginia has banned legacy admissions at its public colleges
description: The new law, which passed unanimously in the Virginia House and Senate, will take effect July 1.

title: Farmers accused of drying up the imperiled Great Salt Lake say they can help save it
description: Environmentalists are suing Utah to force water cutbacks to farmers to save the Great Salt Lake. Farmers call the blame unfair and say that would have its own environmental and economic consequences.

title: Oscars 2024: A night of 'Oppenheimer,' quiet protest, and Ryan Gosling just being Ken
description: For a night with relatively few surprises but some very enjoyable winners, it was a solid show that honored an awful lot of good movies, and movies that drew significant audiences.
